description: This PHP source file generates a web page displaying software information about a network gateway device, including version, firmware name, model, and other software details, by including various header, utility, navigation, and footer components and embedding PHP code to fetch dynamic data.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves string values from device configuration based on specified path.

methods.name: get_wan_type
methods.description: Determines the type of WAN connection (e.g., EPON, eMTA, DOCSIS).
